document.docAuthor: Rodrigues, Juliana Mourão Dos Santos, Nery, Leticia, Rodrigues, Higor D. D. & Moreira, Felipe Ferraz Figueiredo
document.masterDocTitle: Survey of the semiaquatic bugs (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Gerromorpha) from Alagoas and Sergipe, Northeast Brazil

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Survey of the semiaquatic bugs (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Gerromorpha) from Alagoas and Sergipe, Northeast Brazil

caption.paragraph:
FIGURES 83–87. Collected specimens, dorsal view. 83.
Microvelia ayacuchana
. 84.
M. hinei
. 85.
M. longipes
. 86.
M. mimula
. 87.
M. pulchella
. Scale bars: 1.0 mm.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Notes: Moreira & Campos (2012) published the first record of
M. pulchella
from Alagoas , in Delmiro Gouveia municipality. This work expands the records for 21 more municipalities in the same state: Arapiraca, Atalaia, Canapi, Campo Grande, Coité do Nóia, Estrela de Alagoas , Feliz Deserto, Igaci, Jequiá da Praia, Maragogi, Maravilha, Maribondo, Minador do Negrão, Murici, Penedo, Piaçabuçu, Poço das Trincheiras, Quebrangulo, Roteiro, Taquarana, and Viçosa.
